title: Is it permissible to write any part of the Quran, wash it and drink the water for cure Assimalhakeem
transcript: now I think we have one room for one last question Simran says is it permissible to mix poor Anik Papers written with saffron or ink in water to get Shiva if so is there any evidence to it this was reported by the Salif by some of the tabi mean that whenever they had an illness or they feared something to be black magic or evil in a person that you used to write the verses of Rukia with saffron on a plate and then wash the saffron with water and mixed with that writing with the water and make the patient drink from it and it's like giving him rakia this is permissible as it was done by that some of the terrain and allah azzawajal knows best
